subject: Redirecting test output to file
msgSnippet: ... First, you could do this at the operating system level. In UNIX, something like this: java -classpath (your classpath) junit.textui.TestRunner YourTests 1
messageBody:
santu nand wrote:

> I have been told to redirect all the output of junit testing to a log
> file.Can anyone tell me shall i need to change the junit souce code for
> this or i can do something in my testfile which can also help me to do this.

First, you could do this at the operating system level. In UNIX,
something like this:

java -classpath (your classpath) junit.textui.TestRunner YourTests
1> test-stdout.txt 2> test-stderr.txt

Second, please change the Subject line of your e-mails to match the
content of your e-mail. Thanks.
--
